input.sentences: we finally made it to the cafe for the reunion
[male] was there with his camera to take pictures of everybody
the whole gang was there : [male] | [male] | [female] | everybody !
an intense political debate on the merits of plaid oxfords broke out .
but in the end everyone got back massages from [female] .
output.sentences: A promising evening at the club.
Jeremy brought all of his friends along as well.
Each of them eating and enjoying this exotic cuisine broke the ice.
The social environment was excellent for making new friends.
Now everyone has a new friend.
